name: Platformer (Pastel de Cana, ibeboi, Murilazuo)
description:
Platformer (Pastel de Cana, ibeboi, Murilazuo) is a game developed by Murilazuo, Pastel de Cana and ibeboi. It came out on 06-12-2021.
You can play Platformer (Pastel de Cana, ibeboi, Murilazuo) on PC and Web. The game is sold via itch.io.
